description: Underwater footage appears to show an unrecorded four-metre (13ft) hole in the ferry's hull.
title: Estonia ferry disaster: TV crew uncovers new evidence
title_page: Estonia ferry disaster: TV crew uncovers new evidence - BBC News
maintext: The vessel was sailing from Estonia to Sweden on 28 September 1994 when it sank in the Baltic Sea off Finland. Most passengers on board the ship were trapped inside after it capsized, but 97, who managed to leave the vessel, died in the water. There were 137 survivors.
